chart-error-chart-definition-not-found: Error message when the chart definition page is not found. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-chart-definition-invalid: Error message when the chart definition page is invalid. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-data-source-invalid: Error message when the chart tabular data source is invalid. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-data-source-page-not-found: Error message when the chart tabular data source is not found. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-default-source-not-specified: Error message when the chart definition page does not specify a default data source page. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-incompatible-chart-definitio: Error message when the chart definition page is incompatible with charts. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-incompatible-data-source: Error message when the tabular data source page is incompatible with charts. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-invalid-data-source: Error message when the tabular data source page is invalid. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-invalid-height: Error message when the width parser function parameter is not an integer or is too small. Show to the user in Codex message box.
chart-error-invalid-width: Error message when the width parser function parameter is not an integer or is too small. Show to the user in Codex message box.
chart-error-shell-disabled: Error message when shell execution is disabled. Shown to user in Codex message box.
chart-error-rendering-error: Error message when executing the service or shell script returned an error.
chart-error-unexpected: Error message when an unexpected technical error happened when rendering a chart. Shown to the user in a Codex message box.
chart-error-category:
{{Tracking category name}}
Name of tracking category that pages are placed into when a chart fails to render.
chart-render-category:
{{Tracking category name}}
Name of tracking category that pages are placed into when a chart is used on them.
chart-visualeditor-mwchartdialog-title: Title for the VisualEditor chart dialog and context item
chart-visualeditor-mwchartdialog-chart-l: Label in the VisualEditor chart dialog for the chart definition input
chart-visualeditor-mwchartdialog-data-la: Label in the VisualEditor chart dialog for the tabular data source input
chartjson-error-version: Error message displayed when validating a chart JSON page if the version key ($1) is invalid; parameters $2 and $3 are the valid integer range.
chartjson-error-enum: Error message displayed when a chart JSON value $1 needs to be one of a specific list of values and isn't; parameter $2 is the command-separated list of acceptable values.
chart-error-source-not-found: Error message when the chart tabular data source page is not found.
chart-error-invalid-source-type: Error message when the chart tabular data source page is of an invalid type.
chart-error-invalid-source-content: Error message when the chart tabular data source page's contents are invalid.
chart-error-transforms-disabled: Error message when the chart uses a transform but transforms are disabled.
chart-error-request-too-large: Error message when the chart and tabular data combined size exceed the maximum allowed size of $1, determined by the ChartRequestSizeLimit configuration. The size will be automatically formatted with appropriate units and number formatting for the user's language. Also provide a link to documentation on data transformation options available via lua modules.
